p: Guizhou Province is located in Southwest China. The first COVID-19 patient was reported on January 22, 2020, and the last patient was reported on March 16, 2020 ( Fig. 1 ). Given the total of 147 reported cases, Guizhou is one of the five provinces with the lowest number of COVID-19 patients in China (the other four are Xizang, Qinghai, Ninxia, and Xinjiang) ( China, 2020b; Province, 2020).
